channel.title: Softlayer_user_security_question on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_user_security_question on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question Service Datatype Description Every user has an option of a secondary security login feature. This SoftLayer_User_Security_Question service provides a list of security questions. Methods getAllObjects Retrieve all viewable security questions. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_User_Security_Question record.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Security_Question data type contains questions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Security_Question::getAllObjects() Local displayOrder A security question's display order. Type: integer id A security question's internal identifying number. Type: integer question A security question's question. Type: string viewable A security question's viewable flag. Type: integer

item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question::getAllObjects Retrieve all viewable security questions. Overview Retrieve all viewable security questions. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers Optional Headers SoftLayer_User_Security_QuestionObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_User_Security_Question[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question::getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_User_Security_Question record. Overview getAllObjects retrieves all the SoftLayer_User_Security_Question objects where it is set to be viewable. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_User_Security_QuestionInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_User_Security_QuestionObjectMask SoftLayer_User_Security_QuestionObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_User_Security_Question
